<H>(85) {@☀“Irkzya IrzyAyAm”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼510☀-saka-sew-para☼.☀)☼$↰☀IrzyA = asahanam .☼$<NI>☀IrkzyakaH-rkzyikA, IrkzyakaH-rkzyikA,☼$✔1. ☀aByAse cakArekArayoH, uttaraKaRqe kakArazakArayakArARAM ca SravaRaM boDyam .☼✘☀ IrcikzyizakaH-zikA;☼$↰☀IrkzyitA-trI, IrkzyayitA-trI, IrcikzyizitA-trI;☼$↰☀Irkzyan-ntI, Irkzyayan-ntI, Ircikzyizan-ntI;☼$↰☀Irkzyizyan-ntI-tI, Irkzyayizyan-ntI-tI, Ircikzyizizyan-ntI-tI;☼$↰☀-- IrkzyayamARaH, IrkzyayizyamARaH;☼$✔2. ☀‘skoH saMyogAdyoH--’ (☼8☀-☼2☀-☼29☀) iti kakArasya lopaH . zakArasya jaStvam .☼$↰☀yakArasya saMyogAntalopaH .☼✘☀ Irw-IrkzyO-IrkzyaH; -- --☼$↰☀Irkzyitam-taH-tavAn, IrkzyitaH, IrcikzyizitaH-tavAn;☼$↰☀IrkzyaH, IrkzyaH, IrcikzyizuH;☼$↰☀Irkzyitavyam, Irkzyayitavyam, Ircikzyizitavyam;☼$↰☀IrkzyaRIyam, IrkzyaRIyam, IrcikzyizaRIyam;☼$↰☀Irkzyam, Irkzyam, Ircikzyizyam;☼$↰☀IzadIrkzyaH, durIrkzyaH, svIrkzyaH; --☼$↰☀IrkzyamARaH, IrkzyamARaH, IrcikzyizyamARaH;☼$↰☀IrkzyaH, IrkzyaH, IrcikzyizaH;☼$↰☀Irkzyitum, Irkzyayitum, Ircikzyizitum;☼$✔A. ☀‘rADAkfterkzyAkalahAvalokanAt IrzyAM hayantyA ramayA pramoditam .’ DA☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼1☀-☼66.✘☀ IrkzyA, IrkzyaRA, IrcikzyizA;☼$↰☀IrkzyaRam, IrkzyaRam, IrcikzyizaRam;☼$↰☀IrkzyitvA, IrkzyayitvA, IrcikzyizitvA;☼$↰☀samIrkzya, samIrkzya, samIrcikzyizya;☼$↰☀¤Irkzyam ☼2☀, IrkzyitvA ☼2☀, Irkzyam ☼2☀, IrkzyayitvA ☼2☀, Ircikzyizam ☼2☀, IrcikzyizitvA ☼2. <H>(198) {@☀“kuN Sabde”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼951.☀ aka☼.☀ ani☼.☀ Atma☼.☀)☼$✔☀[a] “satyapi hi SabdArTatve Bidyata evEzAmaBiDeyam . taTAhi--kavatistAvat--☼$↰☀avyakte Sabde vartate--uzwraH kokUyate iti . kuvatirapi--Artasvare vartate--☼$↰☀cokUyate vfzala iti; pIqita ityarTaH . kOtistu SabdamAtre .” iti☼$↰☀dEvavyAKyAne puruzakAre upAttaM nyAsavacanamihAnusanDeyam .☼✘$↰☀‘avyaktaSabde kavate, kuvate tvArtaSabdane .☼$↰☀kOtIti SabdamAtre syAt--’ (Slo☼.☀ ☼23☀) iti devaH .☼$<NI>☀kAvakaH-vikA, kAvakaH-vikA, cukUzakaH-zikA,☼$✔4. ☀‘na kavateryaNi’ (☼7☀-☼4☀-☼63☀) iti aByAse cutvanizeDaH . ‘akftsArvaDAtukayoH--’☼$↰☀(☼7☀-☼4☀-☼25☀) iti dIrGaH . evaM yaNante sarvatra boDyam .☼✘☀ kokUyakaH-yikA;☼$↰☀kotA-trI, kAvayitA-trI, cukUzitA-trI, kokUyitA-trI;☼$↰☀-- kAvayan-ntI, kAvayizyan-ntI-tI; --☼$↰☀kavamAnaH, kAvayamAnaH, cukUzamARaH, kokUyamAnaH; ☼[Page0194+ 24]$↰☀kozyamARaH, kAvayizyamARaH, cukUzizyamARaH, kokUyizyamARaH;☼$↰☀kut-kutO-kutaH; -- -- --☼$↰☀kutam-☼$✔A. ☀‘SrutyantavAcA DruvayA pradUnaM GoradravaccakrajitAjYitArim .☼$↰☀smitArdravaktraM gavamAnaBUzaM gE tvAM GutASaM kutaSaNgaGozEH ..’ DA☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼2☀-☼35.✘☀ taH, kAvitaH-tam, cukUzitaH, kokUyitaH-tavAn;☼$↰☀kavaH, kAvaH, cukUzuH, cukAvayizuH, kokuvaH;☼$↰☀kotavyam, kAvayitavyam, cukUzitavyam, kokUyitavyam;☼$↰☀kavanIyam, kAvanIyam, cukUzaRIyam, kokUyanIyam;☼$↰☀kavyam, avaSyakAvyam, kAvyam, cukUzyam, kokUyyam;☼$↰☀IzatkavaH-duzkavaH-sukavaH; -- --☼$✔1. ☀‘akftsArvaDAtukayoH--’ (☼7☀-☼4☀-☼25☀) iti dIrGaH .☼✘☀ kUyamAnaH, kAvyamAnaH, cukUzyamARaH, kokUyyamAnaH;☼$↰☀kavaH, kAvaH, cukUzaH, kokUyaH;☼$↰☀kotum, kAvayitum, cukUzitum, kokUyitum;☼$↰☀kutiH, kAvanA, cukUzA, cukAvayizA, kokUyA;☼$↰☀kavanam, kAvanam, cukUzaRam, kokUyanam;☼$↰☀kutvA, kAvayitvA, cukUzitvA, kokUyitvA;☼$↰☀prakutya, saMkAvya, pracukUzya, prakokUyya;☼$↰☀¤kAvam ☼2☀, kutvA ☼2☀, kAvam ☼2☀, kAvayitvA ☼2☀, cukUzam ☼2☀, cukUzitvA ☼2☀, kokUyam ☼2☀; kokUyitvA ☼2.

Kalyate = saYcIyate DAnyAdika-☼$↰☀miti aDikaraRe GaH . DAnyasaYcayADikaraRasTAnam .☼✘☀ KalaH,☼$✔2. ☀‘BImAdayo'pAdAne’ (☼3☀-☼4☀-☼74☀) ityatra pAWAt apAdAne atipratyaye KalatiH .☼$↰☀KarvAwaH . Syano NidvadBAvAnnANgasya guRaH . ‘Sap-☼$↰☀Syanornityam’ (☼7☀-☼1☀-☼81☀) iti nityaM num .☼✘☀ gupyan-ntI, gopayan-ntI, jugopizan-jugupizan-ntI; --☼$↰☀gopizyan-ntI-tI, gopayizyan-ntI-tI, jugopizizyan-jugupizizyan-ntI-tI;☼$↰☀-- gopayamAnaH, gopayizyamARaH, jogupyamAnaH, jogupizyamARaH;☼$↰☀gub-gup-gupO-gupaH; -- -- --☼$↰☀gupitam-taH-tavAn, gopitaH, jugopizitaH-jugupizitaH, jogupitaH-tavAn;☼$✔4. ☀‘igupaDajYA--’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼135☀) iti kartari kaH .☼✘☀ gupaH,☼$✔5. ☀‘supyajAtO--’ (☼3☀-☼2☀-☼78☀) iti tAcCIlye RiniH .☼✘☀ pragopI, gopaH jugopizuH-jugupizuH, jogupaH;☼$↰☀gopitavyam, gopayitavyam, jugopizitavyam-jugupizitavyam, jogupitavyam;☼$↰☀gopanIyam, gopanIyam, jugopizaRIyam-jugupizaRIyam, jogupanIyam;☼$↰☀gopyam, gopyam, jugopizyam-jugupizyam, jogupyam;☼$↰☀IzadgopaH-durgopaH-sugopaH; -- --☼$↰☀gupyamAnaH, gopyamAnaH, jugopizyamARaH-jugupizyamARaH, jogupyamAnaH;☼$↰☀gopaH, gopaH, jugopizaH-jugupizaH, jogupaH;☼$↰☀gopitum, gopayitum, jugopizitum-jugupizitum, jogupitum;☼$↰☀guptiH, gopanA, jugopizA-jugupizA, jogupA; ☼[Page0398+ 22]$↰☀gopanam, gopanam, jugopizaRam-jugupizaRam, jogupanam,☼$✔1. ☀‘ralo vyupaDAdDalAdeH saMSca’ (☼1☀-☼2☀-☼26☀) iti ktvAyAH vEkalpikaM kittvam . tena☼$↰☀rUpadvayam .☼✘☀ gopitvA-gupitvA, gopayitvA, jugopizitvA-jugupizitvA, jogupitvA;☼$↰☀saNgupya, saNgopya, saYjugopizya-saYjugupizya, saYjogupya;☼$↰☀¤gopam ☼2☀, gopitvA ☼2☀, gupitvA ☼2☀, gopam ☼2☀, gopayitvA ☼2☀, jugopizam ☼2☀ -jugupizam ☼2☀, jugopizitvA ☼2☀ -jugupizitvA ☼2☀, jogupam ☼2☀; jogupitvA ☼2.

<H>(418) {@☀“gUra udyamane”☼@}☀ (☼{#X#}☀-curAdiH-☼1695.☀ aka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ Atma☼.☀)☼$↰☀‘gurate gU (gu) rayeteti Se RAvudyamane taNi .☼$↰☀Syani gUryata ityevaM gatihiMsanayostaNi ..’ (Slo☼.☀ ☼152☀) iti devaH .☼$↰☀kecit ‘gurI’ iti paWanti . anye tu ‘gUrI’ iti paWanti . <H>(490) {@☀“caRa dAne ca”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼796.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ para☼.☀) GawAdiH .☼$✔☀[a] mADabaDAtuvfttiparyAlo canayA curAdAvapi kaScana caRaDAturastIti jYAyate .☼$↰☀kzIrataraNgiRI-sidDAntakOmudyAdizu tasyAnupalamBAt na tasya rUpARi☼$↰☀liKitAni . tasya sattve tu cARakaH-RikA, cicARayizakaH-zikA;☼$↰☀ityAdIni rUpARi cOrAdikakaRaDAtuvat ☼(159)☀ jYeyAni .☼✘$↰☀cakArAd gatAvapi .☼$<NI>☀cARakaH-RikA, cicaRizakaH-zikA, caYcaRakaH-RikA;☼$<P>☀ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi SudDAt, sannantAt, yaNantAYca☼$↰☀BOvAdikakaRativat ☼(157)☀ boDyAni . <H>(491) {@☀“cate yAcane”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼865.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ uBa☼.☀)☼$✔☀[a] ‘cate cade ca yAcane’ iti kzIrasvAmisammataH pAWaH . cakAraH ‘pariBAzaRe’☼$↰☀iti pUrvaDAtvarTasyApyanuvfttisUcakaH .☼✘$✔1. ☀‘ata upaDAyAH’ (☼7☀-☼2☀-☼116☀) iti vfdDiH .☼✘☀ cAtakaH☼$✔A. ☀‘rewattawA yA Kalu cAtakESca cAdyaM jalaM proTati dAtumurvyAm ..’ DA☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼2. 25.✘☀ -tikA, cAtakaH-tikA, cicatizakaH-zikA, cAcatakaH-tikA;☼$↰☀catitA-trI, cAtayitA-trI, cicatizitA-trI, cAcatitA-trI;☼$↰☀catan-ntI, cAtayan-ntI, cicatizan-ntI; --☼$↰☀catizyan-ntI-tI, cAtayizyan-ntI-tI, cicatizizyan-ntI-tI; --☼$↰☀catamAnaH, cAtayamAnaH, cicatizamARaH, cAcatyamAnaH;☼$↰☀catizyamARaH, cAtayizyamARaH, cicatizizyamARaH, cAcatizyamARaH;☼$↰☀cat-cad-catO-cataH; -- -- --☼$↰☀catitam-taH, cAtitaH, cicatizitaH, cAcatitaH-tavAn;☼$↰☀cataH, cAtaH, cicatizuH, cAcataH;☼$↰☀catitavyam, cAtayitavyam, cicatizitavyam, cAcatitavyam;☼$↰☀catanIyam, cAtanIyam, cicatizaRIyam, cAcatanIyam;☼$✔2. ☀‘takiSasicatiyatijanInAmupasaMKyAnam’ (vA☼.☀ ☼3☀-☼1☀-☼97☀) iti yat .☼✘☀ catyam, cAtyam, cicatizyam, cAcatyam;☼$↰☀IzaccataH-duScataH-sucataH; -- --☼$↰☀catyamAnaH, cAtyamAnaH, cicatizyamARaH, cAcatyamAnaH;☼$↰☀cAtaH, cAtaH, cicatizaH, cAcataH;☼$↰☀catitum, cAtayitum, cicatizitum, cAcatitum;☼$↰☀cattiH, cAtanA, cicatizA, cAcatA;☼$↰☀catanam, cAtanam, cicatizaRam, cAcatanam;☼$↰☀catitvA, cAtayitvA, cicatizitvA, cAcatitvA;☼$↰☀pracatya, pracAtya, pracicatizya, pracAcatya;☼$↰☀¤cAtam ☼2☀, catitvA☼2☀, cAtam ☼2☀, cAtayitvA ☼2☀, cicatizam ☼2☀, cicatizitvA ☼2☀, cAcatam ☼2☀; cAcatitvA ☼2☀; ☼[Page0475+ 31]$✔1. ☀‘mandivASi--’ [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8. 21☀] ityAdinoracpratyayaH . catyate'sO janEriti☼$↰☀caturaH = praBurjanaH .☼✘☀ caturaH,☼$✔2. ☀ORAdike [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8. 47☀] zvarac pratyaye rUpam . catante'smin BUtAnIti☼$↰☀catvaram = catuzpaTam . catvarI = vediH .☼✘☀ catvaram☼.☀☼

<H>(494) {@☀“cana ca”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼803.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ para☼.☀) GawAdiH .☼$✔☀[a] atra sidDAntakOmudyAm, ‘vana ca’ iti GawAdizu paWayate . sa ca na☼$↰☀prAmARikaH pAWaH . ‘cana ca’ ityeva BAbyam . ata eva, kzIrasvAmi-☼$↰☀mADava-nArAyaRaBawwAdiBiH hiMsArTakatvena canaDAtuH GawAdO paWitaH,☼$↰☀vyAKyAtaSca . “taYjAvUr sarasvatImahAl” granTAlaye mudrite pARinIya-☼$↰☀DAtupAWanAmake koSe'pi, ‘cana ca’ ityeva dfSyate . ataH bahukoSapramARAnu-☼$↰☀sAreRa hiMsArTakacanaDAto rUpARi pradarSitAni . ‘canu ca’ iti kzIrasvAmi-☼$↰☀pAWaH . tadAnImudittvena ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . tena canitvA-cAntvA, iti☼$↰☀rUpadvayamiti viSezaH .☼✘$↰☀cakArAt hiMsAyAmiti pUrvaDAtugataM sambaDyate .☼$<NI>☀cAnakaH-nikA,☼$✔5. ☀‘GawAdayo mitaH’ (gaRasUtraM BvAdO) iti mittvam . tena, ‘mitAM hrasvaH’☼$↰☀(☼6☀-☼4☀-☼92☀) iti RO upaDAyA hrasvaH . evaM Ryante sarvatra jYeyam .☼✘☀ canakaH-nikA, cicanizakaH-zikA,☼$✔6. ☀‘nugato'nunAsikAntasya’ (☼7☀-☼4☀-☼85☀) iti, yaNante'ByAsasya nugAgamaH . ‘sa ca☼$↰☀padAntavadvAcyaH’ (vA☼.☀ ☼7☀-☼4☀-☼85☀) iti vacanAt parasavarRavikalpaH . evaM yaNante sarvatra☼$↰☀rUpadvayaM boDyam .☼✘☀ caYcanakaH-nikA, caMcanakaH-nikA; <H>(518) {@☀“ci BAzArTaH”☼@}☀ (☼{#X#}☀-curAdiH-☼1795.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ uBa☼.☀)☼$↰☀AsvadIyaH .☼$✔☀[a] sidDAntakOmudyAM ‘ji ci’ iti curAdO BAzArTakezu paWitam . tadanusAreRAtra☼$↰☀rUpARi pradarSitAni . mADavaDAtuvfttO tu ‘juci’ iti paWitvA☼$↰☀‘juYcayati-juYcati’ iti rUpadvayaM pradarSitam .☼✘$<NI>✔1. ☀‘cisPurorRO’ (☼6☀-☼1☀-☼54☀) ityAtve, ‘artihrIvlIrIknUyIkzmyAyyAtAM pug RO’☼$↰☀(☼7☀-☼3☀-☼36☀) iti pugAgame rUpam . evaM Ryante sarvatra jYeyam .☼✘☀ cApakaH-pikA, cicApayizakaH-zikA, cApayitA-trI, cicApayizitA-trI;☼$↰☀cApayan-ntI, cicApayizan-ntI, cApayizyan-ntI-tI;☼$↰☀cicApayizizyan-ntI-tI, cApayamAnaH, cicApayizamARaH, cApayizyamARaH;☼$↰☀cicApayizizyamARaH,☼$✔2. ☀‘cisPurorRO’ (☼6☀-☼1☀-☼54☀) ityAtvaM RO vA Bavati . RijaBAvapakze'pi☼$↰☀Satf-SAnacO BavataH YitkaraRAt . RijaBAvapakze DAtoH halAditvAt ekActvAcca☼$↰☀yaNi--cecIyakaH ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi svAdigaRapaWitacinoteriva☼$↰(519)☀ boDyAni . taTA sannante'pi cicIzakaH-zikA, cikIzakaH-zikA;☼$↰☀ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi jYeyAni .☼✘$<NI>✔1. ☀‘cisPurorRO’ (☼6☀-☼1☀-☼54☀) ityAtvavikalpaH . Atvapakze, AdantalakzaRe pugAgame,☼$↰☀jYapAdipaYcakapAWena mittvAt, RO upaDAyAH ‘mitAM hrasvaH’ (☼6☀-☼4☀-☼92☀) iti hrasvaH .☼$↰☀AtvABAvapakze, vfdDO, AyAdeSe hrasve ca rUpam . evaM Ryante sarvatra rUpadvayasyo-☼$↰☀papattirjYeyA .☼✘☀ capakaH-pikA, cayakaH-yikA, cicapayizakaH-cicayayizakaH-zikA,☼$✔2. ☀YitkaraRasAmarTyARRico vEkalpikatvena RijaBAvapakze SudDAdDAtoH cAyakaH-yikA☼$↰☀ityAdIni rUpARi pradarSitAni .☼✘☀ cAyakaH-yikA;☼$↰☀capayitA-cayayitA-trI, cicapayizitA-cicayayizitA-trI, cetA-trIH;☼$✔3. ☀‘Seze viBAzA'kaKAdAvazAnta upadeSe’ (☼8☀-☼4☀-☼18☀) iti neH RatvavikalpaH .☼✘☀ praRicapayan-pranicayayan-ntI, cicapayizan-cicayayizan-ntI, cayan-ntI;☼$↰☀capayizyan-cayayizyan-ntI-tI, cicapayizizyan-cicayayizizyan-ntI-tI, cezyan-ntI-tI;☼$↰☀capayamAnaH-cayayamAnaH, cicapayizamARaH-cicayayizamARaH, cayamAnaH;☼$↰☀capayizyamARaH-cayayizyamARaH, cicapayizizyamARaH-cicayayizizyamARaH, cezyamARaH;☼$✔4. ☀atra yakArasya vali lope, ‘hrasvasya piti kfti--’ (☼6☀-☼1☀-☼71☀) iti tugAgamaH .☼$↰☀na ca sTAnivadBAvaH SaNkyaH; RopadeSatvamapyasminnevArTe . avaspandanarUpArTe☼$↰☀tu mittvaM na . RopadeSatvAcca Ratvamapi Bavati . anyatra tu mittvaM,☼$↰☀RopadeSatvaM ca na . ata eva Ryante sarvatra rUpadvayaM pradarSitam .☼✘☀ praRawakaH-pranAwakaH-wikA, ninawizakaH-zikA, nAnawakaH-wikA;☼$↰☀nawitA-trI, praRawayitA-pranAwayitA-trI, ninawizitA-trI, nAnawitA-trI;☼$↰☀nawan, ntI,☼$✔2. ☀‘aRAvakarmakAccittavatkartfkAt’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼88☀) iti RyantAt parasmEpadameva, na SAnac .☼✘☀ praRawayan-nawayan, pranAwayan-ntI, ninawizan-ntI; --☼$↰☀nawizyan-ntI-tI, praRawayizyan-pranAwayizyan-ntI-tI, ninawizizyan-ntI-tI;☼$↰☀vyatinawamAnaH, vyatinawizyamARaH, -- nAnawyamAnaH, nAnawizyamARaH;☼$↰☀naw-naq-nawO-nawaH; -- -- --☼$↰☀nawitam-taH, nawitaH-nAwitaH, ninawizitaH, nAnawitaH-tavAn; ☼[Page0611+ 22]$↰☀nawaH,☼$✔1. ☀pacAdyaci gOrAdipAWAt (☼4☀-☼1☀-☼41☀) striyAM NIz .☼✘☀ nawI, nawaH-nAwaH, ninawizuH, nAnawaH;☼$↰☀nawitavyam, nawayitavyam-nAwayitavyam, ninawizitavyam, nAnawitavyam;☼$↰☀nawanIyam, nawanIyam-nAwanIyam, ninawizaRIyam, nAnawanIyam;☼$↰☀nAwyam, nawyam, nAwyam, ninawizyam, nAnawyam;☼$↰☀IzannawaH-☼$✔2. ☀‘duraH zatvaRatvayorupasargatvapratizeDo vAcyaH’ (vA☼.☀ ☼1☀-☼4☀-☼60☀) iti vacanAt RatvaM☼$↰☀na . evaM RopadeSaDAtuzu sarvatra jYeyam .☼✘☀ durnawaH-sunawaH; -- -- --☼$↰☀nawyamAnaH, nawyamAnaH-nAwyamAnaH, ninawizyamARaH, nAnawyamAnaH;☼$↰☀nAwaH, nawaH-nAwaH, ninawizaH, nAnawaH;☼$↰☀nawitum, nawayitum-nAwayitum, ninawizitum, nAnawitum;☼$✔3. ☀‘titutra--’ (☼7☀-☼2☀-☼9☀) itIRRizeDe, ‘zwunA zwuH’ (☼8☀-☼4☀-☼41☀) iti zwutvam .☼✘☀ nawwiH, nawanA-nAwanA, ninawizA, nAnawA;☼$↰☀nawanam, nawanam-nAwanam, ninawizaRam, nAnawanam;☼$↰☀nawitvA, nawayitvA-nAwayitvA, ninawizitvA, nAnawitvA;☼$↰☀praRawya,☼$✔4. ☀‘lyapi laGupUrvAt’ (☼6☀-☼4☀-☼56☀) iti RerayAdeSaH .☼✘☀ praRawayya-pranAwya, ninawizya, nAnawya;☼$↰☀¤nawam ☼2☀, nawitvA ☼2☀,☼$✔5. ☀‘ciRRamulordIrGo'nyatarasyAm’ (☼6☀-☼4☀-☼93☀) iti Ramulpare RO dIrGavikalpaH .☼✘☀ nawam ☼2☀ -nAwam ☼2☀, nawayitvA ☼2☀ -nAwayitvA ☼2☀, ninawizam ☼2☀, ninawizitvA ☼2☀, nAnawam ☼2☀; nAnawitvA ☼2.

dedivitvA ☼2☀;☼$✔3. ☀‘kfviGfzvicCavisTavidavikikidIviH’ [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼1☀-☼26☀] ityanena kvinpratya-☼$↰☀yAnto dIrGopaDaSca nipAtitaH . ‘kiki’ iti dIvyatIti kikidIviH =☼$↰☀cAzaH . ‘Syenena kikidIvinA’ (fgvede ☼10☀-☼97☀-☼13☀) iti, ‘CagalaM☼$↰☀kalmAzaM kikidIvi’ iti tEttirIyakaprayogAcca dIrGatftIyo'yaM SabdaH, kecittu☼$↰☀dIrGadvitIyaM kikIdiviH ityapi paWanti .☼✘☀ kikidIviH,☼$✔4. ☀ORAdike [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼6. 51☀] kaninpratyaye rUpam . pratidIvyate'smin ityaDikaraRe☼$↰☀pratyayaH . pratidivA = divasaH .☼✘☀ pratidivA,☼$✔5. ☀RyantAt ORAdike [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8☀-☼40☀] kvipi, Rerluki, devayatIti dyOH =☼$↰☀svargo'ntarikzaM vA .☼✘☀ dyOH,☼$✔6. ☀‘diverdyu ca’ [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8. 81☀] iti zwranpratyaye, ‘dyu’ iti prakfterAdeSe vfdDO ca☼$↰☀dyOtram iti Bavati . dIvyanti tasmin sukftinaH iti dyOtram = tridivaH,☼$↰☀vimAnaM vA .☼✘☀ dyOtram,☼$✔7. ☀‘vfzAdiByaScit’ [da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8☀-☼109☀] iti kalapratyaye, bAhulakAd guRe ca rUpam☼$↰☀devalaH = fziH .☼✘☀ devalaH☼.☀ ☼[Page0745+ 27]

SUramAnI,☼$✔1. ☀kAlImAtmAnaM manyate ityarTe KaSpratyaye, Syani ca kfte, ‘striyAH puMvat--’☼$↰☀(☼6☀-☼3☀-☼34☀) iti prAptaM puMvadBAvaM paratvAd bADitvA, ‘Kityanavyayasya’ (☼6☀-☼3☀-☼66☀)☼$↰☀iti hrasvaH . tena kAlimmanyA iti sidDyati .☼✘☀ kAlimmanyA,☼$✔2. ☀‘divA’ ityaDikaraRaSaktipraDAnamavyayam . evamBUtasyApyasya vfttivizaye karmatvaM☼$↰☀boDyam . tena divA manyate ityarTe'tra KaSi, avyayatvAdupapadasya mum, hrasvaSca☼$↰☀neti jYeyam . evameva dozAmattyam ityatrApi jYeyam .☼✘☀ divAmanyA-dozAmanyam,☼$✔3. ☀atrApi pUrvavat gAm AtmAnaM manyate ityarTe KaSi, ‘ica ekAco'mpratyayavacca’☼$↰☀(☼6☀-☼3☀-☼68☀) ityanena Kidante pare ekAcaH pUrvapadasya ‘go’ ityasya am ityAgamo☼$↰☀Bavati, sa ca ‘--pratyayavacca’ (☼6☀-☼3☀-☼68☀) iti vacanAt svAdipratyayavad Bavati .☼$↰☀tena ‘Oto'mSasoH’ (☼6☀-☼1☀-☼93☀) ityanena pratyayASrita AkAro'tra Bavati . tena☼$↰☀gAmmanyaH iti rUpaM sidDyati .☼✘☀ gAmmanyaH,☼$✔4. ☀striyamAtmAnaM manyate ityarTe KaSi, pUrvavat ‘ica ekAcaH--’ .☼✘☀ striyammanyaH-strIMmmanyaH,☼$✔5. ☀naraM AtmAnaM manyate ityarTe KaSi, amAgame, ‘fto NisarvanAmasTAnayoH’☼$↰☀(☼7☀-☼3☀-☼110☀) iti guRe narammanyaH iti rUpam . atra ‘--pratyayavacca’ SAnaci,☼$✔1. ☀SAnaci, ‘divAdiByaH--’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼69☀) iti Syani, rUpamevam . atra Syano'pi-☼$↰☀tsArvaDAtukatvena NidvadBAvAt ‘GumAsTA--’ (☼6☀-☼4☀-☼66☀) iti IkAre sati mIyamAnaH☼$↰☀ityeva nyAyyam . ‘gAmAdAgrahaRezvaviSezaH’ (pari☼.☀ ☼116☀) iti vacanamapyasya IkAre☼$↰☀'nukUlam . taTApi sarvErapi vEyAkaraREH ‘GumAsTA--’ (☼6☀-☼4☀-☼66☀) sUtre BOvAdikA-☼$↰☀dAdikajOhotyAdikamADAtUnAmeva grahaRasyoktatvAt atra na IkAra iti jYeyam .☼✘☀ mAyamAnaH iti rUpam .☼
<H>(1244) {@☀“mAna pUjAyAm”☼@}$↰☀(☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼972.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ Atma☼.☀)☼$✔☀[a] ‘mAnerjijYAsAyAm’ iti (kASikA ☼3☀-☼1☀-☼6☀) vacanAt pUjitavicAre☼$↰☀DAtorasya nityasannantatvam . na tu icCArTakaH san . ‘nityasannantatvasADanAcca DAtoH☼$↰☀pfTak prayogABAvAt pUjAdyarTapAWo vyarTaH’ iti haradattAdayaH . svArTasannantAt☼$↰☀krameRa Ryantasma, icCAsannantasya ca prayogaH pradarSita iti jYeyam .☼✘$<NI>☀‘pUjAyAM mAnayet mAnet yO, mImAMseta taNsanoH .’ (Slo☼.☀ ☼126☀) iti devaH .☼$✔2. ☀‘mAnbaDadAnSAnByo dIrGaScAByAsasya’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼6☀) iti svArTe san . aByAsakAryezu☼$↰☀pravfttezu dIrGaScAByAsasya Bavati . evamevottaratra sarvatrApi jYeyam .☼✘☀ mImAMsakaH-sikA, mImAMsdakaH-sikA, mImAMsayizakaH-zikA,☼$✔3. ☀‘avayave kftaM liNgaM samudAyasya viSezakaM Bavati’ (BAzyam ☼3☀-☼1☀-☼6☀) iti vacanAt☼$↰☀svArTasannantAdevAsyAtmanepadatvam, arTAntare tu curAdipAWa unneyaH . tadAnIM☼$↰☀‘SezAt kartari--’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼78☀) iti parasmEpadam . svArTasannapi arTAntare na☼$↰☀Bavati ityataH mAnakaH-nikA, mAnayitA-trI, mAnayan-ntI ityAdIni☼$↰☀rUpARyUhyAni .☼✘☀ mAnakaH-☼$↰☀nikA; mImAMsitA-trI, mImAMsayitA-trI, mImAMsayizitA-trI, mAna-☼$↰☀yitA-trI; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikadIdAMsativat☼$↰(832)☀ jYeyAni . asyAtmanepaditvAt SAnajeva, na Sateti viSezaH .☼$✔4. ☀‘naptfnezwf--’ (da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼2☀-☼3☀) ityAdinA tfntfcoH pratyayayoH nakAralope ca rUpamevam .☼$↰☀mAtA = jananI .☼✘☀ mAtA . ☼[Page1018+ 28]

Satari-☼$✔8. ☀Satari, ‘divAdiByaH--’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼69☀) iti vikaraRapratyaye Syani, tasyApitsArva☼$↰☀DAtukatvena NidvadBAvAd aNgasya guRanizeDe prApte sati, ‘miderguRaH’ (☼7☀-☼3☀-☼86☀)-☼$↰☀iti guRo viDIyate, tena rUpamevamiti jYeyam .☼✘☀ pramedyan-☼$✔D. ☀‘naByAMstuBya viBo jayeti nuvate klidyan pramedyadrujam--..’ DA☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼2. 67.✘☀ ntI, medizyan-ntI-tI, iti rUpARi Bavantyasyeti viSezaH . ☼[Page1025+ 33]

<H>(1340) {@☀“yama uparame”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼819☀-☼984.☀ saka☼.☀ ani☼.☀ para☼.☀)☼$✔☀[a] ‘yamo ganDane’ (☼1☀-☼2☀-☼15☀) iti sUtre ganDanarUpasya (ganDanam = sUcanam’☼$↰☀paradozAvizkAra iti yAvat .) arTasyApyupAdAnAt, DAtorasyopasargavaSAt,☼$↰☀svaBAvAd vA tatrApyarTe vfttiriti jYeyam . <H>(1341) {@☀“yama ca parivezaRe”☼@}☀ (☼{#X#}☀-curAdiH-☼1626.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ uBa☼.☀)☼$✔☀[a] curAdizu jYapAdipaYcakaDAtuprakaraRe ‘yama ca parivezaRe’ (ga☼.☀ sU☼.☀ curAdO)☼$↰☀iti paWyate . tasyAyamarTaH--parivezaRe = parivezwane'rTe yamaDAtuScurAdizu☼$↰☀boDyaH; tasya ca kramaprApto mittvAdistu BavatIti . parivezaRaBinnArTe tu Otsa-☼$↰☀rgike BvAdipAWe, tasmAdDetumaRRici niyAmayati, niyAmakaH ityAdikAni☼$↰☀rUpARi tiNantAdizu BavantIti jYeyam . ‘yama ca--’ iti durgAdisammataH☼$↰☀pAWaH . cakArarahitapAWastu kzIrataraNgiRIdfzwaH . ‘aparivezaRe’ ityapi☼$↰☀kezAYcitpAWa iti kzIrataraNgiRyAdito jYAyate; sa ca pAWaH puruzakAra-☼$↰☀mADavaDAtuvfttipraBftizu KaRqita ityalam . parivezaRam = vezwanam . BvAdizu☼$↰☀paWitasya ‘yamo'parivezaRe’ ityasya tu ‘parivezaRam = Bojanam’ ityarTa☼$↰☀iti boDyam .☼✘$<NI>☀‘yameruparame yacCet yamayet parivezaRe .’ (Slo☼.☀ ☼148☀) iti devaH .☼$↰☀yamakaH-yamikA, yiyamayizakaH-zikA, yamayitA-trI, yiyamayizitA-trI;☼$↰☀ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikacahayativat ☼(515)☀ jYeyAni . Satari☼$✔A. ☀‘caRqAtakaM suyamayan cahako baBAze .’ DA☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼3☀-☼25.✘☀ suyamayan .☼
<H>(1342) {@☀“yasu prayatne”☼@}☀ (☼{#IV#}☀-divAdiH-☼1210.☀ aka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ para☼.☀)☼$<NI>☀yAsakaH-sikA, yAsakaH-sikA, yiyasizakaH-zikA, yAyasakaH-sikA;☼$↰☀yastA-yastrI, yAsayitA-trI, yiyasizitA-trI, yAyasitA-trI; ☼[Page1075+ 28]$↰☀ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikagrasativat ☼(440)☀ jYeyAni . Satari--☼$✔1. ☀Satari divAditvAt nityaM Syanpratyaye prApte, ‘yaso'nupasargAt’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼71☀) iti☼$↰☀vikalpena Syan . pakze Otsargike Sapi yasan-ntI iti rUpamiti boDyam .☼✘☀ yasyan-ntI, yasan-ntI, prayasyan-☼$✔A. ☀‘aTAyasyan kazAyAkzaH svinnaHsvedakaRolbaRaH .’ Ba☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼5. 83.✘☀ Ayasyan-ntI,☼$✔2. ☀‘saMyasaSca’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼72☀) iti saMpUrvakAdapi SyanvikalpaH . ‘-- anupasargAt’☼$↰☀(☼3☀-☼1☀-☼71☀) ityuktatvAt aprApte'nena sUtreRa sampUrvakasyApi vEkalpikaH Syan iti☼$↰☀jYeyam .☼✘☀ saMyasyan-saMyasan-ntI,☼$✔3. ☀tacCIlAdizu kartfzu ‘sampfcAnuruDANyamANyasa--’ (☼3☀-☼2☀-☼142☀) ityAdinA Dinu-☼$↰☀Rpratyaye rUpamevam .☼✘☀ AyAsI,☼$✔B. ☀‘saMjvAriReva manasA DvAntamAyAsinA mayA .’ Ba☼.☀ kA☼.☀ ☼7. 6.✘$✔4. ☀prayatnasya cittavatkartfkatvAdasmAt RyantAt ‘aRAvakarmakAt--’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼88☀) ityAdinA☼$↰☀parasmEpade prApte, ‘na pAdamyANyamANyasa--’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼89☀) ityAdinA ANpUrvakAt☼$↰☀parasmEpadanizeDaH . tena paragAmini kriyAPale parasmEpadam, AtmagAmini kriyA-☼$↰☀Pale tu ‘RicaSca’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼74☀) iti AtmanepadaM BavatIti jYeyam . etacca mADavA-☼$↰☀dyanuroDenoktam . kzIrasvAmI tu-- “-- ‘na pAdami--’ (☼1☀-☼3☀-☼89☀) iti taN--☼$↰☀AyAsayate .” ityuktavAn . tenAsya mate parasmEpadanizeDAdAtmanepadameva☼$↰☀nyAyyamiti jYAyate . vastutastu mADavoktameva nyAyyamityalam .☼✘☀ AyAsayan-ntI, AyAsayamAnaH,☼$✔5. ☀‘udito vA’ (☼7☀-☼2☀-☼56☀) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . tena rUpadvayam . etena☼$↰☀nizWAyAmiRnizeDe yastaH, yastavAn iti rUpanizpattiriti jYeyam .☼✘☀ yastvA-yasitvA,☼$✔6. ☀bAhulakAt, grahyAderAkftigaRatvena ‘AvaSyakADamarRyayorRiniH’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼170☀) ityane-☼$↰☀nAvaSyakArTe vA prapUrvakAdasmAt Rinipratyaye prayAsI iti rUpam . vastutaH☼$↰☀prapUrvakAdasmAdGaYi, GaYantAt matvarTIya inipratyaye'pi rUpanizpAdanaM nyAyyamiti☼$↰☀boDyam .☼✘☀ prayAsI,☼$↰☀yastaH-yastavAn itImAni rUpARyasya viSezeRa BavantIti jYeyam .☼

<H>(1383) {@☀“raSa (samUhakiraRaSabdezu?)”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH☼.☀ aka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ para☼.☀)☼$<NI>☀“raSirasmA aviSezeRopadizwaH, saH rASiH, raSmiH, raSanA ityevaM- ☼[Page1108+ 27]$↰☀vizayaH . …” iti ‘tfjvat krozwuH’ (☼7☀-☼1☀-☼95☀) ityatra BAzyAt☼$↰☀“raSiluSI apaWitAvapi BAzyakAravacanAd DAtU bodDavyO .” iti pradIpa-☼$↰☀vAkyAt, “DAtupAWe paWitAvAcAryeReti bodDavyAvityarTaH .” iti☼$↰☀uddyotavAkyAcca raSaDAtuH DAtupAWe pUrvamAsIdaDunA tu Brazwa iti jYAyate .☼$↰☀tatra ca niruktarUpatrayavizaya evAsya prayoga ityapi BAzyAdasmAjjYAyate .☼$↰☀prayuktAnAM SabdAnAM rASi-raSmi-raSanAtmakAnAM lokaprayogAnusAreRAsmABirarTa-☼$↰☀nirdeSa UhitaH . <H>(1545) {@☀“vaqi viBAjane”☼@}☀ (☼{#I#}☀-BvAdiH-☼271.☀ saka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ Atma☼.☀)☼$<NI>☀‘viBAjanam = BAgIkaraRam, carmABAvaSca . ‘curAdO☼$✔1. ☀‘vaqi viBAjane’ iti (curAdO) paWitvA, ‘wAnta ityeke’ iti kzIrataraNgiRyAM☼$↰☀dfSyate . SAkawAyanastu [vaqi] ityevameva .☼✘☀ vaRqayati’ iti kzIrasvAmI .☼$↰☀carmABAvo nAma SipivizwatA (dvinagnatA)--vAgISaH .☼$↰☀‘-- vezwane’ iti mEtreyaH . “nandI tu vawi viBAjane, vaqi vezwane iti☼$↰☀BaNgyA paWati” iti kzIrasvAmivacanamihAnusanDeyam . “kASakftsna-☼$↰☀DAtupAWakannaqawIkAyAM ‘vaqi vezwane’ iti pAWaH . vAhIka (paYjAb) deSIya-☼$↰☀BAzAyAM viBAjanArTikA ‘vaRqanA’ kriyA prayujyate . tena ‘viBAjane’☼$↰☀ityapyarTaH prAmARika eva” iti tatra wippaRyAmuktaM yuDizWiramImAMsakena .☼$↰☀vaRqakaH-RqikA, vaRqakaH-RqikA, vivaRqizakaH-zikA, vAvaRqakaH-RqikA;☼$↰☀vaRqitA-trI, vaRqayitA-trI, vivaRqizitA-trI, vAvaRqitA-trI;☼$↰☀ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakampativat ☼(166)☀ jYeyAni . ☼5☀-☼1☀-☼79☀) iti hi prakftereva karmaRi ktapratyayo dfSyate .☼$↰☀tadvadihApi RyarTavfttereva ca vfteH ‘vftto guRo devadattena’ iti Bavizyati;☼$↰☀nipAtanamanarTakam? tatkriyate--yadApi RicEva RyarTo'BiDIyate, tadA-vartita-☼$↰☀mityaDyayane mA BUditi kecit . apare tu-varttito guRo devadattena ityapi☼$↰☀icCanti .” iti kASikAvfttiH (☼7☀-☼2☀-☼6☀) . SapaTaH = pratijYA .☼✘☀ SapaTaH,☼$✔4. ☀‘SASapiByAM--’ (da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼6☀-☼48☀) iti danpratyayaH . ‘SabdavEra--’ (☼3☀-☼1☀-☼17☀)☼$↰☀iti nipAtanAt pakArasya dakAraH .☼✘☀ SabdaH, SAbdikaH,☼$✔5. ☀‘SaperbaSca’ (da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8☀-☼108☀) iti kalapratyayaH, pakArasya bakAraSca .☼✘☀ SabalaH,☼$✔6. ☀‘Sapervan’ (da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8☀-☼131☀) iti vanpratyayaH . GanaM daDi .☼$↰☀viSezaRaviSizwavastuno'pi mUrtiSabdena grahaRamiti prakriyAsarvasvam .☼✘☀ abBraGanaH,☼$✔4. ☀‘antarGano deSe’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼78☀) iti nipAtanAt deSe vAcye antaHpUrvakAdasmAt☼$↰☀appratyaye prakfterGanAdeSaH . antarGanaH = vAhIkagrAmaviSezaH . antaH maDye hanyate-☼$↰☀'treti vfttiH . ‘antarGaRaH’ iti kftaRatvaM kecit sUtra eva paWanti . tezAM,☼$↰☀‘antaSSabdasya aNkiviDiRatvezu upasargatvaM vaktavyam’ (vA☼.☀ ☼1☀-☼4☀-☼65☀) ityuktyEva☼$↰☀sidDaM Ratvam-iti BAvaH .☼✘☀ antarGanaH-antarGaRaH,☼$✔5. ☀‘agArEkadeSe praGaRaH praGARaSca’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼79☀) iti nipAtanAt sADuH . bAhya-☼$↰☀prakozWake'linde vA vAcye prapUrvakAdDanteH appratyaye prakfteH GanAdeSaH ‘praGARaH’☼$↰☀ityatra dIrGaH, RatvaM ca nipAtanalaByAni . ‘praGaRaH’ ityatra tu ‘hanteratpUrvasya’☼$↰☀(☼8☀-☼4☀-☼22☀) iti RatvaM sidDameva .☼✘☀ praGaRaH-praGARaH,☼$✔6. ☀ut upari yasya niDAya anyat kAzWAdikaM takzyate tasmin = atyADAne vivakzite☼$↰☀‘udGano'tyADAnam’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼80☀) iti nipAtanAt pUrvavat GanAdeSAdikam .☼✘☀ udDanaH,☼$✔7. ☀apa hanyate iti ‘apaGano'Ngam’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼81☀) iti nipAtanAt sADuH .☼✘☀ apaGanaH,☼$✔8. ☀ayaH hanyate yena saH ayoGanaH kUwaH . vihanyate yena saH viGanaH = samIkaraRasA-☼$↰☀Danam . druH hanyate yena saH druGanaH = kuWArAdiH . ‘karaRe'yovidruzu’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼82☀)☼$↰☀iti hano'ppratyaye GanAdeSaH . ‘druGaRaH’ iti kecit . tadAnIm, ‘pUrvapadAt☼$↰☀saMjYAyAmagaH’ (☼8☀-☼4☀-☼3☀) iti, arIhaRAdizu (☼4☀-☼2☀-☼80☀) ‘druGaRaH’ iti pAWAdvA☼$↰☀Ratvamatreti jYeyam .☼✘☀ ayoGanaH, viGanaH, druGanaH-druGaRaH,☼$✔9. ☀stambaSabda upapade karaRe hanaH kapratyayaH; = paSuH .☼✘☀ dftihariH-nATaharirvA paSuH,☼$✔2. ☀saMhriyante'nena, atra iti vA saMhAraH = yudDam, pralayaSca . ‘aDyAyanyAyodyAva-☼$↰☀saMhArASca’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼122☀) iti nipAtanAt GaY . sUtre cakArasyAnuktasamuccAyArTa-☼$↰☀katvAt avahAraH ityapIti kASikA . avahAraH = coraH . GApavAdo GaY .☼$↰☀upasargeRa DAtorarTAH Bidyante; taTAcoktaM pUrvEH--☼$↰☀“upasargeRa DAtvarTo balAdanyatra nIyate .☼$↰☀vihArAhArasaMhAraprahAraparihAravat ..” iti .☼✘☀ saMhAraH, avahAraH,☼$✔3. ☀‘akartari ca kArake saMjYAyAm’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼19☀) iti GaY . hriyate paSyatAM mano'neneti☼$↰☀hAraH = muktAdisaraH .☼✘☀ hAraH,☼$✔4. ☀BidAdi (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼104☀) pAWAt striyAmaNi, ‘fdfSo'Ni--’ (☼7☀-☼4☀-☼16☀) iti guRe,☼$↰☀gaRapAWAdeva dIrGe ca rUpam . haraRaM hArA .☼✘☀ hArA,☼$✔5. ☀Ahriyante'smAt rasAH iti AhAraH Bojanam . evam aByavahAraH ityapi .☼$↰☀atra ‘akartari ca--’ (☼3☀-☼3☀-☼19☀) iti GaY .☼✘☀ AhAraH,☼$✔6. ☀harati pApAdikamiti haraH = SivaH . pacAdyac . praRatArti haratIti praRatArtiharaH .☼$↰☀atra ‘harateranudyamane--’ (☼3☀-☼2☀-☼9☀) iti ac . paSyantaM anAdftya haratIti☼$↰☀paSyatoharaH-kasyacitsaMjYA . ‘zazWI cAnAdare’ (☼2☀-☼3☀-☼38☀) iti zazWI . ‘zazWyA☼$↰☀AkroSe’ (☼6☀-☼3☀-☼21☀) iti zazWyA aluk .☼✘☀ haraH-paSyatoharaH,☼$✔7. ☀harati natAnAM kleSAdIn iti hariH = vizRuH . atra ‘haraterdftinATayoH paSO’☼$↰☀(☼3☀-☼2☀-☼25☀) ityatra yogaviBAgena inpratyayaH . kecit tu yogaviBAge BAzyAdi-☼$↰☀pramARABAvAt ORAdike inpratyaye sADayanti .☼✘☀ hariH-hariRI, haritaH, hfdayam, harimARaH, harImA,☼$↰☀prahiH, hareRuH, iti viSezarUpARi . sAmAnyarUpARi BOvAdikaBarativat☼$↰(1170)☀ boDyAni .☼
<H>(2017) {@☀“hfza tuzwO”☼@}☀ (☼{#IV#}☀-divAdiH-☼1229.☀ aka☼.☀ sew☼.☀ para☼.☀)☼$<NI>☀‘…kramato'lIke tuzwO harzati hfzyati .’ (Slo☼.☀ ☼176☀) iti devaH .☼$↰☀“‘hfzu’ iti nandI, svAmI ca” -iti mADavaH . kzIrasvAmI ‘hfza’ ityeva☼$↰☀papAWa .☼$✔8. ☀DAtoH sewtve'pi ‘vismitapratiGAtayoSca’ (vA☼.☀ ☼7☀-☼2☀-☼29☀) iti vacanAt☼$↰☀iqvikalpo nizWAyAm . aniwpakze takArasya zwutvena wakAraH . vismitatvaM vizaRRatvaM☼$↰☀ca dantAH sUcayantIti BAvaH .☼✘☀ hfzwaH, hfzitaH,☼$✔9. ☀‘hfzerlomasu’ (☼7☀-☼2☀-☼29☀) iti lomasu vAcyezu nizWAyA iqvikalpaH . prAptaviBAze-☼$↰☀yam . ‘lomAni aNgajAni, keSASca’ iti vfttiH . tuzwiM lomAni sUcayantItyarTaH .☼✘☀ saMhfzwAni-saMharzitAni lomAni . hfzwaScEtraH, hfzwAH ☼[Page1420+ 28]$↰☀dantAH, hfzitA vA .☼$✔1. ☀RijantAt ORAdike itnucpratyaye rUpamevam .☼✘☀ harzayitnuH .☼$✔2. ☀‘hfzerulac’ (da☼.☀ u☼.☀ ☼8☀-☼106☀) ityulacpratyayaH . harzulaH = santuzwaH .☼✘☀ harzulaH . harzaH-SrIharzaH, praharzI . sAmAnya-☼$↰☀rUpARi BOvAdikarezativat ☼(1408)☀ boDyAni .☼
